name: Multi-level New Limo Parking Fever
description:
Get Yourself ready to drive the New Limousine in a real city. You have already played the limousine simulator games or other car driving or parking games. But playing this game , you have the chance to make yourself a legend driver in the city adventure.Our Limousine car parking game is the fun simulator game.
Be aware of the time limit in this Limousine game. Get Ready to play out the different exciting levels , all the levels gets hard with time passage. In these Luxury limousine levels , you can easily test your Driving skills to make yourself a champion drive parking in all the simulation cases.Be professional in parking xtreme car. While playing this you are best in parking precision driving. Think as you are driving in modern city trip and driving valet car parking 3d. Be the king in 3d parking and become the master of speed parking.
Extraordinary skills must be needed to do the best driving. Finally the Ultimate Challenge - driving on raised platforms only just wide enough for your car.Have a lot of fun with this new and unique car parking game of 2017! Race for the Best times with Realistic Handling Limos in royal city parking.We've given you the tools - now go prove you can use them.
Its a great and loving game for driver agents to drive the vehicle in euro city driving area. Our Limo simulator is the best city drive game in parking and simulation games. You can drive limo anywhere but please be on time , otherwise you may lose your driving mission.
Features:
- amazing City Environments
- awesome high quality graphics
- realistic limousine parking and driving controls
- different parking levels each with its one challenge
- realistic and effective sound
